Hotel Piora, Airolo, Switzerland. June 24.
I have not been progressing so fast as I hoped and my docter
recommends me to stay in Switzerland thorugh most of
July. So I shall not be at St. Andrews at their function. Is
there any chance of persuading you to come out and make a t???,
like that delightful one of last year? I am at present at Piora
with two colleagues, who will be staying on for 10 days or a
fortnight: but I am not very much enamoured of this place and would
infinitely rather join you. I would suggest that, if you could
come out, the Zinal valley which is next to^ the Evolene ??, would
be an excellent one to explore. The station is Sierre,
next to Sion. I shall certainly leave this^place by July 34rd.
Yours ever B.P.Grenfell
